Package controller

Class MovieGoerController

java.lang.Object
controller.MovieGoerController
public class MovieGoerController extends Object
This class represents the Controller for MovieGoer It handles all database functions related to MovieGoer database file

  • Method Details

    • createMovieGoerAccount

      public static boolean createMovieGoerAccount(MovieGoer newMovieGoerAccount)
      CREATE a new MovieGoer Account, adding into the database file with separator | e.g. userId|username|password|password|name|phone|emailAddress|age checks for existing username and if it exist, returns false else registers the user and return true
      Parameters:
      newMovieGoerAccount - New MovieGoerAccount to be added
      Returns:
      true if registration successful else false

    • loginMovieGoerAccount

      public static MovieGoer loginMovieGoerAccount(MovieGoer movieGoerAccount)
      READ the username of the MovieGoer account in the arraylist of getMovieGoerAccountList() return null if no such username was found, used by createMovieGoerAccount() to test for existing username
      Parameters:
      movieGoerAccount - MovieGoer account contains (username and password)
      Returns:
      the matched the MovieGoer account and returns the MovieGoer object

    • getMovieGoerByMovieGoerId

      public static MovieGoer getMovieGoerByMovieGoerId(int movieGoerId)
      READ all the MovieGoer in array list by getMovieGoerAccountList() returns the MovieGoer if MovieGoer's ID matches return null if no such MovieGoer exist
      Parameters:
      movieGoerId - MovieGoer's ID
      Returns:
      MovieGoer by that movieGoerId
